Instrument.name: The Rosetta Plasma Consortium (RPC) Ion Composition Analyser (ICA) for the Rosetta Orbiter
Instrument.description: The Ion Compisition Analyser (ICA) element of the Rosetta Plasma Consortium (RPC) measured the three-dimensional distribution of positive ions. It consisted of an electrostatic acceptance angle filter, an electrostatic energy filter, and a magnetic momentum filter. Particles were detected by microchannel plates and a two-dimensional anode system. The energy range of the ICA was 25 - 40 keV, and the angular field of view, achieved by electrostatic deflection, was 360 x 90 degrees.
